    L

    laboratory - Variable in class World
    laboratory room instance
    lightsOn - Variable in class CellarStealthSystem
    Boolean used to save the state of whether the player had completed the Stealth sequence(Repairing the power box and turning the lights back on)
    loadCheckpoint() - Method in class Game
    Method used to load checkpoint upon dying
    loadFromFile(String, String) - Method in class World
    Method used to load the rooms from the file
    loadFromFile_ValidFiles_PopulatesRoomsAndSearchSpots(Path) - Method in class WorldTest
    Tests world initialization from file system.
    loadGame(File) - Method in class Game
    Method used to load the data saved in GameState, when choosing to load a previous save
    loadLatestCheckpoint() - Method in class CellarStealthSystem
    Method used to load the latest checkpoint during the stealth sequence(upon dying), resets player's position
    loadRooms(String) - Method in class World
    Method used to load rooms into the game from the file
    loadSearchSpots(String) - Method in class World
    Method used to load the search spots from a file
    Lock - Class in Unnamed Package
    Method used to implement the Locks in the game, their fields, behavior and values
    Lock(String, String, String, boolean) - Constructor for class Lock
    Constructor
    lockedMessage - Variable in class Lock
    message for if the lock's status is locked
    lockedRoom - Variable in class GearLock
    Used to reference the Laboratory room, which is locked until the mechanism in Cellar is unlocked
    lockStates - Variable in class GameState
    Map used to store states of locks in the game(Name,hasItBeenUnlockedYet?)
